beads-ready.template: Check Beads for ready tasks and provide a summary of what's available to work on. Use 'bd ready --json' to get the current state of ready tasks.

beads-create.template: Create a new Beads task with the title: $ARGUMENTS. Use appropriate priority and type flags. Format as 'bd create "Task Title" -p [priority] -t [type] --json'.

beads-close.template: Close the specified Beads task(s). Use 'bd close $ARGUMENTS --reason "Completed" --json'. Make sure to include proper reasoning for the closure.

beads-sync.template: Synchronize Beads database with git. Run 'bd sync' to export pending changes to JSONL, commit to git, and push to remote if needed.

beads-status.template: Check the current status of Beads tasks. Use 'bd list --json' to show all current tasks and their states. Focus on in-progress and blocked items.

land-plane.template: Land the plane: Complete ALL remaining work, run quality gates (lint/test if code changes), update Beads issues, sync with git, and push to remote. Follow the complete landing workflow ensuring git push succeeds and git status shows 'up to date'.
land-plane.description: Complete session and push all changes

planner.description: Strategy and design specialist for architecture and implementation planning

builder.description: Implementation specialist focused on writing high-quality code

reviewer.description: Code quality and security specialist for reviewing code and best practices
